response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will meet your needs and expectations. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $1,500,000, and I am hopeful that you will find this offer compelling. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. I look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 1200000}
